## Dialog.show() method

Show the dialog.

**Signature:**

```typescript
show(afterShow?: () => void): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

afterShow


</td><td>

() =&gt; void


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ A function that will be called immediately after showing the dialog. Can be useful if awaiting this method.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

Promise of string return value (typically the tag of the button that caused the closure).

## Remarks

This method can be awaited until the dialog is closed.
